description:
🎙️In the freshest episode of the Cybernews podcast, we deep-dive into the grim realities of the tech industry, explore the truth behind AI's impact, and expose the hidden costs of Big Tech w/ Paris Marx, Canadian journalist and the host of the "Tech Won't Save Us" podcast.

Check out our regular weekly podcasts here: https://open.spotify.com/show/08yjUTmHb9rtvqDHxTjWhR?si=a032eef08ed44b78

00:00 Introduction to the Cyber News Podcast
00:15 Meet Paris Marx: Tech Critic Extraordinaire
00:59 The Core Problems in the Tech Industry
04:05 The Impact of Neoliberal Policies on Tech
07:49 AI's Threat to White-Collar Jobs
15:09 Apple's AI Features: A Closer Look
23:14 The Environmental and Ethical Costs of Tech
28:37 Sam Altman on AI and Climate Impact
29:49 Tech Companies and Cloud Business
31:34 Economic Viability of AI
36:20 Deepfakes and Misinformation
42:49 The Future of the Internet
48:00 AI Regulation and Geopolitics
57:38 Optimism vs. Pessimism in Tech

Sources:
https://www.techwontsave
title: The Truth Big Tech Won't Share w/ Paris Marx | Cybernews Podcast
